function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Downloading content from unknown sources","Impact":"Potential exposure to malware or viruses","Mitigation":"Use reputable sources and antivirus software","Technologies":"Antivirus software, firewall, secure download protocols","People":"General internet users","Owner":"Individual users, IT departments"},{"Description":"Lack of information about the content downloaded","Impact":"Risk of unknowingly obtaining harmful content","Mitigation":"Verify the authenticity of the source before downloading","Technologies":"Authentication protocols, digital signatures","People":"General internet users","Owner":"Individual users, IT departments"},{"Description":"Exposure to outdated content","Impact":"Inaccurate or obsolete information","Mitigation":"Verify the publication date and source credibility","Technologies":"Content verification tools, metadata analysis","People":"General internet users","Owner":"Individual users, content providers"}]}
